### Data-driven design 

![](assets/engineering.jpg){fig-align="center" width="40%"}

Customization and mass-manufacturing often don't sit well together.\ Data-driven approaches ensure that custom requirements are met quickly.

### Field intelligence for product quality

![](assets/quality.jpg){fig-align="center" width="40%"}

Machine learning applied to field data to make sense of whats happening in the market. This cost-effective approach is used to proactively manage field quality while kepping the CO2 footprint to the minimum.
